who is the Max Verstappen: Max Verstappen is a highly talented and experienced young driver, known for his incredible driving skills and determination. Born in 1996, he has already proven himself on various racing circuits, including Formula 1. As of now, Max is a rookie driver with many goals to achieve, especially in his quest to be the next great driver in the industry.
